bibl.title: A Reassessment of Cleopatra III's Syrian Campaign.
bibl.note: A reassessment of Cleopatra III's achievement in the Syrian campaign (103 B.C.), which has usually been regarded as an interlude of little importance if not an outright failure.
bibl.seg: WHITEHORNE J.E.G., A Reassessment of Cleopatra III's Syrian Campaign.
A reassessment of Cleopatra III's achievement in the Syrian campaign (103 B.C.), which has usually been regarded as an interlude of little importance if not an outright failure.
